statements: SELECT * FROM ChatbotFAQ;
SELECT question_text, answer_text FROM ChatbotFAQ WHERE question_id = '4c064fe8-5b6d-4d33-a98f-0fe1aec7a315';
SELECT question_text, answer_text FROM ChatbotFAQ ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT question_text, UPPER(answer_text) FROM ChatbotFAQ WHERE question_text LIKE '%weather%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_questions FROM ChatbotFAQ;
SELECT * FROM ChatbotFAQ WHERE question_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT question_text, answer_text FROM ChatbotFAQ WHERE question_text LIKE '%help%';
SELECT * FROM ChatbotFAQ WHERE answer_text IS NULL;
SELECT question_id, question_text, answer_text FROM ChatbotFAQ ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_questions FROM ChatbotFAQ;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_messages LIMIT 10;
SELECT message_text, response_text FROM chatbot_messages WHERE message_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_queries WHERE answered = true;
SELECT query_text FROM customer_queries WHERE query_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_messages WHERE message_text LIKE '%hello%';
SELECT message_text, response_text FROM chatbot_messages WHERE response_text IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM customer_queries WHERE query_text LIKE '%refund%' AND answered = FALSE
SELECT message_id, message_text, response_text FROM chatbot_messages ORDER BY message_id DESC
SELECT query_id, query_text FROM customer_queries WHERE query_text NOT LIKE '%complaint%'
SELECT * FROM chatbot_messages WHERE message_text = 'Hello'
SELECT * FROM User;
SELECT name FROM User WHERE id = 1;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM Message WHERE sender_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, question, answer FROM FAQ WHERE id > 5 AND id < 10 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT email, name FROM User WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM User WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM User WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT message_text FROM Message WHERE receiver_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT question, answer FROM FAQ WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM Message WHERE sender_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM chatbot_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email FROM chatbot_users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT question, answer FROM chatbot_faq WHERE category = 'billing';
SELECT * FROM chatbot_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM chatbot_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, message_text, timestamp FROM chatbot_messages WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT faq_id, question, answer FROM chatbot_faq WHERE category = 'General' ORDER BY faq_id;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM chatbot_logs WHERE user_id = 3 AND action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM bot_users;
SELECT user_name, joined_date FROM bot_users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT question_text, answer_text FROM faq_questions WHERE category_id = '1001';
SELECT user_name, feedback_rating, feedback_comment FROM bot_users JOIN user_feedback ON bot_users.user_id = user_feedback.user_id;
SELECT user_name, message_text FROM bot_users INNER JOIN user_messages ON bot_users.user_id = user_messages.user_id WHERE message_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM bot_users;
SELECT user_name, joined_date FROM bot_users ORDER BY joined_date DESC;
SELECT message_text, message_time FROM user_messages WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) FROM faq_categories JOIN faq_questions ON faq_categories.category_id = faq_questions.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT user_name, feedback_rating, feedback_comment FROM bot_users JOIN user_feedback ON bot_users.user_id = user_feedback.user_id WHERE feedback_rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_time ASC;
